title: The Pope's Iraq trip could be his most dangerous yet. But the country's dwindling Christian minority hopes it heals their wounds
content:
1. The Pope's Iraq trip could be his most dangerous yet. But the country's dwindling Christian minority hopes it heals their wounds  CNN

localize.title: 教皇的伊拉克之行可能是他迄今为止最危险的一次。但该国日益减少的基督教少数派希望它能治愈他们的伤口。
教皇的伊拉克之行可能是他迄今爲止最危險的一次。但該國日益減少的基督教少數派希望它能治癒他們的傷口。
